original_text: Then they are to take some of the blood and put it on the sides and tops of the doorframes of the houses where they eat the lambs.
korean_text: 그 피를 양을 먹을 집 좌우 문설주와 인방에 바르고

sentences.original_text: Then they are to take some of the blood
and put it on the sides and tops of the doorframes
of the houses where they eat the lambs
